parameters.name: namespaceURI
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the namespace URI of the document to be created, or null if the document doesn't belong to one.

parameters.name: qualifiedNameStr
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the qualified name, that is an optional prefix and colon plus the local root element name, of the document to be created.

parameters.name: documentType Optional
parameters.description: Is the DocumentType of the document to be created. It defaults to null.

parameters.name: qualifiedNameStr
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the qualified name, like svg:svg.

parameters.name: publicId
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the PUBLIC identifier.

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the SYSTEM identifiers.

members.name: DOMImplementation.createHTMLDocument()
members.description: Creates and returns an HTML Document.

parameters.name: title  Optional (except in IE)
parameters.description: Is a DOMString containing the title to give the new HTML document.

members.name: DOMImplementation.hasFeature()
members.description: Returns a Boolean indicating if a given feature is supported or not. This function is unreliable and kept for compatibility purpose alone: except for SVG-related queries, it always returns true. Old browsers are very inconsistent in their behavior.

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: Is a DOMString representing the feature name.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Is a DOMString representing the version of the specification defining the feature.
